name: Tying Knots
description: Knot is an online puzzle game that we hand picked for Lagged.com. This is one of our favorite mobile puzzle games that we have to play.

name: Camping Game
description: Check out some camping games over at kevin.games! Very exciting and new, Check out this camping trip jigsaw!

name: Hangman
description: Guess the letters in the secret word to solve the puzzle. You can guess a letter by clicking it or typing it on your keyboard. You'll score points for each correct letter you guess

name: Scavanger Hunt
description: TerraClues is the ultimate Google Maps scavenger hunt game! Check it out and see how you get on, play it with friends for the most fun!

name: Treasure Hunt
description: Within this game, you get to create a treasure hunt and test it out! Involve your friends or even make new ones by inviting them along!

name: Word Search
description: Word Search for scouts! this is the perfect game to get the brain going to search and find, these are even available to print, you can do them with the group and win prizes!
